item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Webflow ended up being a little bit overkill for my needs so I’ve set up this template (with some difficulty admittedly) as a more maintainable and still visually pleasant portfolio. The blog posts will track progress updates on any of my personal projects and anything else cool that I wanted to share. Feel free to explore! I hope you enjoy your time here :D
